description:
Description of os-server-groups is missing from the Compute API reference [1].

[1]: http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref-compute-v2.1.html
title: os-server-groups description is missing

comments.content:
Description of os-server-groups is missing from the Compute API reference [1].

[1]: http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref-compute-v2.1.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gergely-csatari

comments.content: Can you point the exact location so that I can confirm?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sharat-sharma

comments.content:
Ｔｈａｎｋ　you for your reporting. Currently the nova issue for api-site is freezing state.

Ref.
http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-docs/2016-April/008453.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sakaia

comments.content:
Hi Sharat Sharma, 

I can not point to the location to it as it is completely missing. 
In the V2 API this was part of Extensions, but extensions is deprecated in V2.1 of the API and the API reference states, that the extensions are part of the V2.1 API (" If you enable all extensions, the Compute API v1.1 and v2.0 requests and responses match the API v2.1 requests and responses.").
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gergely-csatari

comments.content:
Hi Atsushi SAKAI, 

Okay. 

Thanks for the info.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gergely-csatari

comments.content: I'm going to mark this as invalid to get it out of the bug queue. We'll fix this as part of the work in https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/api-ref-in-rst .
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
